title: Minimal Impact of Healthcare Costs on Poverty
description: In 2017, only 0.01% of Panama's population was pushed below the $2.15 poverty line due to out-of-pocket healthcare expenses, indicating a robust healthcare safety net.

title: Low Arms Export Activity
description: In 2019, Panama's arms exports were valued at just 1,000,000 SIPRI trend indicator values, reflecting minimal involvement in the global arms trade.

title: Negligible Taxes on Exports
description: In 2018, Panama imposed only 150 LCU in taxes on exports, highlighting a favorable environment for international trade.
